means: 高兴的，乐意的
令人高兴的，使人愉快的
（风光）明媚的，（景色）美丽的
充满欢乐的，兴高采烈的
使高兴
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 格拉德来源于古英语人名，含义是“灿烂的，快乐的”(shining,joyful)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 格拉德绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“欢乐的”(merry,jolly)
Gay and Lesbian Advocates and Defenders 男，女同性恋支持者和辩护者
glenolabral articular disruption 盂唇关节断裂

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"愉快的，高兴的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: happy, glad, cheerful, joyful, merry, delightful, gay, pleasant, nice, jolly, agreeable
means: happy ： 侧重感到满足、幸福或高兴。
glad ： 最普通用词，语气较弱，表示礼貌的惯用语。指乐于做某事或因某事而感到满足，常表愉快的心情。
cheerful ： 多指因内心的愉快而表现出兴高采烈，是强调而自然的感情流露。
joyful ： 语气较强，强调心情或感情上的欣喜。
merry ： 指精神情绪的暂时高涨，表示欢乐、愉快的心境或情景，侧重充满欢笑声和乐趣。
delightful ： 指能带来强烈的快乐，激起愉快的情感，用于非常愉快的场合。
gay ： 侧重无忧无虑、精神昂扬、充满生命的快乐。
pleasant ： 侧重给人以"赏心悦目"或"愉快的，宜人的"感受。
nice ： 语气较温和，泛指任何愉快或满意的感觉。
jolly ： 通俗用词，多指充满快乐与喜悦的神情。
agreeable ： 指与感受者的愿望、情趣或受好等和谐一致而带来的心情上的快意。

sentence.Network_en: I'm so glad to see you back where you belong.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真高兴看到你又回到了属于你自己的天地。

sentence.Network_en: I'm so glad he had a pang of conscience.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很高兴他会有负疚感。

sentence.Network_en: I can't tell you how glad I was to leave that place.
sentence.Network_cn: 我无法形容自己离开那个地方心里有多高兴。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English glæd (originally in the sense 'bright, shining'), of Germanic origin; related to Old Norse glathr 'bright, joyous' and German glatt 'smooth', also to Latin glaber 'smooth, hairless'

entry.def: If you are glad about something, you are happy and pleased about it.

example.ex: I'm glad I relented in the end...
example.tran: 我很高兴自己的态度最终缓和了下来。

example.ex: The people seem genuinely glad to see you...
example.tran: 这些人见到你好像发自内心地感到喜悦。

entry.def: If you say that you will be glad to do something, usually for someone else, you mean that you are willing and eager to do it.

example.ex: I'll be glad to show you everything...
example.tran: 我将很乐意向你们展示一切。

example.ex: We should be glad to answer any questions.
example.tran: 我们愿意回答任何问题。

means.word_mean: 1. showing or causing joy and pleasure; especially made happy;

auth_sentence.content: I am glad the president came to our area.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am glad the president came to our area.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am glad the president came to our area.

auth_sentence.content: I would be glad to peer review your data.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would be glad to peer review your data.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would be glad to peer review your data.

auth_sentence.content: She's glad her kids are getting nutritious food.

Sentence.sentence: He was so glad to see them that he didn't even think to read the sign by the entrance.
Actually, Laura, I think we laugh because we are glad it didn't happen to us.

sentences.en: I am glad about his new job.
sentences.cn: 我为他的新工作感到高兴。

sentences.en: I shall be glad for you to come.
I am glad you have succeeded.

means.word_mean: 使人高兴的, 令人快乐的

sentences.en: How did you get the glad news?
sentences.cn: 你是如何得到这个令人高兴的消息的?

sentences.en: After a long separation, they held a glad meeting.
sentences.cn: 阔别多年之后, 他们举行了一个令人愉快的聚会。

sentences.en: I'll be glad to do you a favour.

jushi.chinese: 他有一副喜气洋洋的神情。

jushi.english: On the birthday party, she wore glad rags.
jushi.chinese: 在生日晚会上,她穿上了漂亮的衣服。

jushi.english: How did you get the glad news?
jushi.chinese: 你是如何得到这个令人高兴的消息的?
